docs.snippet: VICHY, France, May 31 -- Upon returning to Vichy today after five days in Paris consulting with the occupying authorities on French-German collaboration, Admiral Francois Darlan, the Vice Premier, tonight took the occasion of the British bombings at...
docs.lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, May 31 -- Upon returning to Vichy today after five days in Paris consulting with the occupying authorities on French-German collaboration, Admiral Francois Darlan, the Vice Premier, tonight took the occasion of the British bombings at Sfax, Tunisia, to direct a violent broadside at Britain.

docs.snippet: Higher Furniture Prices Seen Further price Increases on furniture, ranging from 3 to 5 per cent 0ver quotations at the midseason markets in May, will probably be put into effect, next month when the new lines are shown, manufacturers asserted...
docs.lead_paragraph: Higher Furniture Prices Seen Further price Increases on furniture, ranging from 3 to 5 per cent 0ver quotations at the midseason markets in May, will probably be put into effect, next month when the new lines are shown, manufacturers asserted yesterday.
